patterns_discovered.test_structure: step-by-step test implementation with detailed logging
patterns_discovered.flutter_interaction: consistent JSON-RPC request patterns for Flutter widget interaction
patterns_discovered.state_verification: capture/compare pattern for widget tree state changes
patterns_discovered.error_handling: structured try/catch with detailed error reporting
patterns_discovered.assertion_strategy: multiple verification points rather than single assertions

gotchas_discovered.widget_tree_visibility: Todo text may not be directly visible in widget tree (might be in controller)
gotchas_discovered.selector_patterns: Delete button uses 'deleteButton_{id}' pattern, requires flexible selector matching
gotchas_discovered.ui_update_timing: Need explicit wait periods for UI state changes to propagate
gotchas_discovered.stats_parsing: Counter text format needs careful parsing (e.g., '1 of 3 total todos')

approach_outcome.approach: comprehensive end-to-end testing covering creation, deletion, and state verification
approach_outcome.coverage: widget tree changes, counter updates, UI responsiveness
approach_outcome.validation_strategy: before/after comparison with multiple verification methods

recommendations.code_structure: Consider extracting common request patterns into helper methods
recommendations.timing: Implement configurable wait times instead of hardcoded sleep() calls
recommendations.error_handling: Add more granular error categorization (network vs UI vs data errors)
recommendations.selectors: Create a selector utility class for common widget interactions
recommendations.logging: Add structured logging format for better test result analysis
recommendations.cleanup: Implement todo cleanup in tearDown methods to prevent state pollution
